label: Global Finance
title: Global_Finance_(magazine)
exrest: Global Finance is an English-language monthly financial magazine. The magazine was founded in 1987 by Joseph D. Giarraputo, the founder and former publisher of Venture, Carl G. Burgen, Stephan Spahn, H. Allen Fernald, and Paolo Panerai, and covers the topic of financial globalization. The magazine's primary target audience consists of Chairmen, Presidents, CEOs, CFOs, Treasurers, and other financial officers. The magazine is distributed in 158 countries, with 50,050 global subscribers and recipients, certified by BPA Worldwide.
